synopsis.text: What awaits is a heartfelt tale of a young boy and his snowman companion, Norman, as they embark on a journey to witness the mesmerizing spectacle of shooting stars illuminating the night sky. Unbeknownst to them, their plans may be thwarted by an impending cloudy sky, turning their adventure into a charming quest filled with warmth and camaraderie. As the night of the shooting stars approaches, the duo sets off on another exciting chapter of "Norman the Snowman," seeking the celestial beauty that awaits them.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
